summary: Completed frontend testing of Arabic/English student progress app new features: inline student editing, profile avatar upload, header profile navigation, and export functionality

ui_bugs.issue: Profile update fails with error message 'Profile update failed'
ui_bugs.details: Profile name and email updates are not being saved successfully, error toast appears

passed_tests: Students inline edit row functionality (edit/cancel buttons work)
Students inline edit save functionality (name updates successfully)
Profile avatar upload UI elements present and functional
Export functionality - PDF and Excel downloads work
Students table displays with proper data
Settings page loads with profile section scrolled into view
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix profile update API integration - profile name/email changes are not being saved successfully, showing 'Profile update failed' error message
